data.title: 2024 video game release schedule
data.meta_description: Our schedule has 2024 video game release dates for the best AAA and indies coming out this year.
data.text:
With the end of the year closing in, our 2024 video game release schedule has really started to fill out a bit now, and as you can see below, it's packed with games to your ever-expanding backlog.

We've still got some huge games to look forward to, including Silent Hill 2, Indiana Jones and The Great Circle, and Assassin's Creed Shadows, and we shouldn't forget about those double-A and indie offerings either. The Plucky Squire, The Rise of the Golden Idol and Hyper Light Breaker early access are just some of the exciting smaller titles releasing in 2024. Check out our most exciting games of 2024 for more great games to watch out for.

We'll update this page as more games get announced and release dates are finalised, so keep reading to see what the 2024 video game release calendar is looking like this year.
